definition: Caltrop or puncture vine (Tribulus terrestris)/to thatch (a roof)
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.chinese: 奥卡万戈的猎豹母子，博茨瓦纳，1999。

sentences.english: Tswana speakers tend to live near the border with Botswana.
sentences.chinese: 说茨瓦纳语的人一般住在博茨瓦纳边境附近。

sentences.english: Merafhe said that the government of Botswana thanks China for its various assistance.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉费说，博茨瓦纳政府感谢中国提供的各种援助。

sentences.english: This was shot in Chobe Reserve in Botswana.
sentences.chinese: 这照片摄取在博茨瓦纳丘比保护区。

sentences.english: Botswana and South Africa both use efavirenz extensively.
sentences.chinese: 博茨瓦纳和南非都广泛地使用依法韦伦。

sentences.english: This population covers most of northern Botswana plus northwestern Zimbabwe.
sentences.chinese: 象头数有北部博茨瓦纳和西北津巴布韦的总和那么多。

sentences.english: Photo by:Chris Johns Okavango Cheetah Brothers, Botswana, 1999
sentences.chinese: 奥卡万戈的印度豹兄弟，博茨瓦纳，1999。

sentences.english: They are Botswana, lvory Coast, Ethiopia, Kenya, Mozambique, Rwanda, South Africa, Uganda, Guyana, and Haiti.
sentences.chinese: 非洲西南部一个沙漠，主要在博茨瓦纳境内。

sentences.english: However, Botswana’s diversification strategy is threatened by an energy crisis.
sentences.chinese: 然而，博茨瓦纳的多元化战略受到了能源危机的影响。

sentences.english: Mr. Tsvangirai is due to hold a press conference Friday in Botswana.
sentences.chinese: 茨万吉拉伊定于星期五在博茨瓦纳举行记者会。

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
